content: say goodbye to single-use plastic bags and hello to this stylish and eco-friendly alternative - the essential string shopping bag made with durable and planet-friendly paintbox yarns recycled cotton worsted this bag is the perfect shopping companion - take it to the shops the farmers market or even to the beach - this bag can carry it all this free pattern includes easy-to-follow instructions and three different strap options to make this accessory one you ll use time and time again **measurements** ● diameter 8in/20cm ● height 12½in/32cm ● short handle length 5in/13cm ● long handle length 16½in/42cm **materials** yarn available at lovecrafts com ● 3 ½oz/100g balls of paintbox yarns recycled cotton worsted 2 balls in either night blue string or steel blue ● us 7 4 5mm crochet hook **gauge gauge ** 18 sts and 17 row to 4in/10cm of single double crochet using a us 7 4 5mm hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge gauge 30 stitches and 8 row measured over 4in/10cm of net stitch using a us 7 4 5mm hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge gauge
